name: CORS Request Handling
summary: Enables CORS (Cross Origin Resource Sharing) request handling.
description: This policy enables Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) request
handling. It allows to define CORS headers such as
When combined with the APIcast policy, the CORS policy should be
placed before it in the chain.

allow_origin.description: Origin allowed for CORS requests. The field expects only one origin (e.g. https://example.com) or '*'. If left blank, the value of the 'Origin' request header will be used. In case of valid regexp, and if it matches with Origin header value, the value will be set to the Origin Value. In case of does not match, the header will not set at all.

allow_credentials.description: Whether the request can be made using credentials

max_age.description: The ttl of the preflight response (default: 600)
